dmca.title: [ABUSE] Fw: Illegally using our copyrighted name]
dmca.body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Fw: Illegally using our copyrighted name
Date:         Tue, 8 Mar 2005 21:23:31 -0600
From:         Media <media@bet-won.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         admin@goldenpalace.com



We have also found it in them spamming our URL name in these areas as
well and who knows how many more:

http://www.daltokyo.com/Gamble/angle-handicapping-horse-racing.php

http://www.centrex-france.com/Gamble/greyhound-handicapping-system.php

http://www.arkzin.com/Betting/triple-crown-betting-odds.php
- ----- Original Message -----
*From:* Media <mailto:media@bet-won.com>
*To:* abuse@theplanet.com <mailto:abuse@theplanet.com>
*Cc:* admin@goldenpalace.com <mailto:admin@goldenpalace.com>
*Sent:* Tuesday, March 08, 2005 9:13 PM
*Subject:* Illegally using our copyrighted name

Dear Abuse Department:

In performing a routine Google search for our Domain name of Bet-Won.com
we found one of your hosted sites  [ http://www.nmtc.net/ = [
70.84.113.250
<http://www.samspade.org/t/whois?a=70.84.113.250;server=auto> ] using
our Copyrighted and Registered Name to keyword spam their site up into
the search engines. Located below the fold on your browser.

Please see: http://www.nmtc.net/Gamble/greyhound-handicapping.php

We have had this problem before with them. They simply took it down and
now put it back up.

We are therefore placing you on notice that we would like a Cease and
Desist placed on that Website from using our name Bet-Won (notice with
hyphen!) to steer our traffic to their website which has absolutely ZERO
affiliation with ours.

I look forward to your prompt action and reply in this matter.

Sincerely,

John Chiappetta
JCPublications
www.bet-won.com <http://www.bet-won.com>

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
THe Planet Internet Services, LLC
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.6 (GNU/Linux)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCMBluvK/XpJs6oyURAjOkAJ90YRnm2Dx14seXDhEvXUocihtOBACgk8y6
wZtH6vZJqhllUHy8cw1J/pk=
=lPT8
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
